name: Happy Maze
description: Easy game for easy life. Enjoy.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Xp Processor: Any CPU 2 Ghz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 2 GB Video memory and DX 11 Support DirectX: Version 11
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Any CPU 3+ Ghz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia 860 2gb+ DirectX: Version 11
